name: Political Calm
description: A sudden absence of political machinations and distracting intrigue coincides with a rise in public approval for its leaders.

criticalSuccess.msg:
You capitalize upon the public approval with efficiency and speed. or reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @lose1Corruption
  • @lose1Crime
  • @lose1Decay
  • @lose1Strife
Gain a +2 status bonus to all checks made to resolve events during your next Kingdom turn.

success.msg: Loyalty is up across the board. @lose1d4Unrest

failure.msg: The calm is a refreshing change, but people sense it cannot last. @lose1Unrest

criticalFailure.msg:
The calm simply hides deeper plotting simmering in the shadows. Increase a Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife
